name: MARTABusTracker
0:
”Alexa, ask MARTA Bus Tracker where is route 125 south.”
”Alexa, ask MARTA Bus Tracker route 2 eastbound.”
”Alexa, ask MARTA Bus Tracker where is route 125 headed southbound.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: marta bus tracker
des:
Find out the locations and timeliness of a MARTA bus route.

It will list the bus location and schedule adherence. IE I found 2 eastbound buses. A bus near East Ponce and North Decatur is 2 minutes late. A bus near Avondale Station is on time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
